CustomField.description: Indicates the method to calculate the selling term for Line Items.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The level of accuracy to calculate selling terms. With "Precise", selling term is calculated using total number of days in start and end months (e.g. 8/30 to 9/29 = 1.03118 mo). Valid values (default="Normal"): Normal Precise
CustomField.label: Selling Term Calculation Method
